title: BRIEF-Seneca Foods Says ‍Estimates $5 Million To $20 Million Charges To Be Incurred for Closure Of Modesto Facility​
text: Market News February 20, 2018 / 3:08 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Seneca Foods Says ‍Estimates $5 Million To $20 Million Charges To Be Incurred for Closure Of Modesto Facility​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 20 (Reuters) - Seneca Foods Corp: * SENECA FOODS SAYS ‍ESTIMATES $5 MILLION TO $20 MILLION TOTAL PRE-TAX P & L CHARGES TO BE INCURRED IN CONNECTION WITH CLOSURE OF MODESTO FACILITY​ - SEC FILING * SENECA FOODS CORP - $5 MILLION TO $20 MILLION CHARGE ‍ PRIMARILY RELATES TO CASH PAYMENTS FOR EMPLOYEE SEPARATION AND IMPAIRMENT CHARGES​ * SENECA FOODS CORP - IN CONNECTION WITH CLOSING OF MODESTO FACILITY ‍$8 MILLION VENDOR ADVANCE MAY BE REQUIRED TO BE REPAID (NO P & L IMPACT)​ Source text ( bit.ly/2sKqD3Q ) Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
